metadata.synopsis: In the Knights of the Shield hideout, when players arrive, will begin a combat with the Githyanki that are using the hideout to seek the prism. In the combat, after the last reinforcement,
metadata.how_to_trigger: Begin the combat, let S_LOW_Elfsong_GithyankiShield_Caster_003 live until the end of the reinforcements and, in his turn, will say this.

0.speaker: Veteran Gish Zhendila
0.text: We've exhausted all reinforcements - we are the final stand. Ch'mar, zal'a Vlaakith!
